llm_command:
bash
kubectl apply -n default -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-frontend-checkout-to-currency
  namespace: default
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currencyservice
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: frontend
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: checkoutservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7000
EOF
